thread.title: Trump takes domestic violence "very seriously": White House

title: Trump takes domestic violence "very seriously": White House
text:
Trump takes domestic violence "very seriously": White House 7:48am GMT - 01:18 
White House spokeswoman Sarah Sanders says President Trump and his administration take domestic violence ''very seriously'' and allegations should be investigated ''thoroughly.'' Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
White House spokeswoman Sarah Sanders says President Trump and his administration take domestic violence "very seriously" and allegations should be investigated "thoroughly." Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2EApTTl
